line-9: Network Rail have an opportunity for the right candidate to become part of our Capital Delivery Eastern team as a Capital Programme Planning Assurance Manager This is an exciting unique opportunity for a committed, highly motivated & enthusiastic individual to join our Business Intelligence Planning and Controls team. As Planning Assurance Manager your role will be to manage the supply chain programme assurance and business needs to ensure successful delivery of our projects. You will lead planning assurance activities on behalf of the project team(s) for Major Projects and Programmes across Anglia - including Beaulieu New Station and Cambridge South Infrastructure Enhancement (CSIE). You will ensure programmes comply with company and legislation standards and are compliant with Project Acceleration in a Controlled Environment (PACE). This full time role is based in our Stratford office, with a requirement to work out of this location three days per week minimum.
